name: mail
description: macOS Mail email access service supporting email content reading, thread retrieval, and attachment extraction
author: fatbobman

env_schema.name: MAIL_THREAD_MAX_BODY_LENGTH
env_schema.description: Maximum body length per email when reading threads (default: 1200). Lower values reduce token usage for large threads.

env_schema.name: MAIL_SINGLE_MAX_BODY_LENGTH
env_schema.description: Maximum body length when reading a single email (default: 10000). Higher than thread limit to preserve full content.

env_schema.name: MAIL_KEEP_QUOTE_LINES
env_schema.description: Number of quote lines to preserve when stripping quoted content in threads (default: 10). Helps maintain conversation context.

env_schema.name: MAIL_ATTACHMENT_PATH
env_schema.description: Base temp directory path for attachment extraction (default: /tmp, actual directory will have 'mail-mcp-attachments' subdirectory appended)
